original: 正史無此人，乃《三國演義》所虛構。為曹操部下，負責鎮守東嶺關。關羽千里走單騎時，孔秀因職責阻擋關羽過關，被關羽所殺，也是第一名被斬的將領。
text: There is no such person in the official history, which is a fictional fiction in The Romance of the Three Kingdoms. As Cao Cao's subordinate, responsible for guarding Dongling Pass. When Guan Yu was riding solo for thousands of miles, Kong Xiu blocked Guan Yu from passing through due to his duties, and was killed by Guan Yu. He was also the first general to be beheaded.
